channel.title: Ip Ban Not Working?
channel.description: OK so some spammer comes on and he wont stpo spamming so i go into his char profile get his ip paste it in the banned ips folder, compile and reset my server, and yet he still comes back. He just cant log into an account he arldy made. Anyone know how to get rid of him for good?

item.title: Ip Ban Not Working?
item.dc:creator: @brovolll brovolll
item.description:
@brovolll wrote:

… omg lol so u really are noob (new) well put it under a command… and hooty can you please add it threw codes

btw here is myn… it works for me lol

[code] if (command.startsWith(“ipban”)
&& (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Scrappy”))) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

        appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
        v.disconnected = true;
        sendMessage("player successfully ip banned");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName
                + ": HAS IP BANNED THE PLAYER: " + command.substring(5);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(
                    new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
                }
            }
        }
    }

[/code]

item.title: Ip Ban Not Working?
item.dc:creator: @hootywooty hootywooty
item.description:
@hootywooty wrote:

try making a command that ip bans them. If it helps at all

} else if ((playerRights > 3) && command.startsWith(“ipban”)) {
try {
int pid = Integer.parseInt(command.substring((command
.indexOf(" “) + 1)));
if (pid < 1) {
sendMessage(“Invalid pid”);
return;
}
client bannedUser = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pid];
if ((bannedUser == null) || (bannedUser.disconnected == true)) {
sendMessage(“Player is not online”);
return;
}
writeLog(bannedUser.connectedFrom, “ipbans”);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = bannedUser.playerName;
yell(bannedUser.playerName
+ " has been ip banned from your server.”);
}

Read full topic

ud need to look for a tut on how to fix that…wit my ip ban it used to just ban tha account as soon as it was logged off…but now it will first look to see if there usin a real client to prevent people from usin a bot that will multilog and crash the server…then it will use there computer ip instead of that isp it gives u so they cant log on
